API description: A data storage management API offering the following features:

API method parameters.name: auth_password
API method parameters.description: Password to protect this file. auth_username parameter is required if auth_password is set.

constraints.inter-dependency: auth_password, auth_username: auth_username parameter is required if auth_password is set.

API method parameters.name: expiration_seconds
API method parameters.description: Number of seconds before the file becomes unavailable.

API method parameters.name: auth_username
API method parameters.description: Username to protect this file. auth_password parameter is required if auth_username is set.

constraints.inter-dependency: auth_username, auth_password: auth_password parameter is required if auth_username is set.

API method parameters.name: download_limit
API method parameters.description: Number of downloads before the file becomes unavailable.
